title: J&J Holistic Nutritional Therapy
description: We use a holistic approach in all consultations with our patients. This means we  consider the person as a whole, as a sum of all the interconnected components that make that person unique.

p.li: We use a holistic approach in all consultations with our patients. This means we consider the person as a whole, as a sum of all the interconnected components that make that person unique.
